Eukaryote genome assembly resources Sujai Kumar & Helen Hipperson 2023-04-20 Chapter 1 Videos, slides, & files 1.1 Introduction Slides 1.2 Day 2 Slides 1.3 Workshop files The below compressed directory is provided so you may attempt the workshop materials on a computer/cluster available to you. Note: The file locations will not match The . use scripts will not work. You will have to install your own programs. I recommend looking into conda to more easily install programs. Download files 1.4 Bookdown html Links to the online version of the Bookdown. Main You can download the html files of the bookdown below. Ensure you unzip the directory before use. Download main zipped bookdown 1.5 List of programs List of programs used and links on how to install them: kmc - https://anaconda.org/bioconda/kmc seqtk - https://anaconda.org/bioconda/seqtk seqkit - https://anaconda.org/bioconda/seqkit hifiasm - https://anaconda.org/bioconda/hifiasm busco - https://anaconda.org/bioconda/busco tiara - https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/tiara purge_dups - https://anaconda.org/bioconda/purge_dups yahs - https://github.com/c-zhou/yahs#installation mitohifi - https://github.com/marcelauliano/MitoHiFi#2-installation
